Title: Thanks for your help! Thanks for your support!
Designer: Zhao Yannian (赵延年)Yu Yunjie (俞云阶)
Publisher: Tianjin meishu chubanshe (天津美术出版社)
Notes: Who is thanking who? Is it agriculture thanking industry (in the truck in which the female peasants are sitting: chemical fertilizer, spare parts), or industry thanking agriculture (the truck in which the worker sits transports foodstuffs, raw materials for industrialization)?The text on the truck going back to the village means cooperative (合作社).
